item.description: Edited: There are so many wonderful ladies that are going to attend that there's been a slight change in plans. So let's get together to check out the food and crafts of the SOWA Open Market. We can sample all of the food trucks, check out local artisans crafts and wares. The market runs through October so if we have a great time we can check it out in the fall as well when they have all different food trucks and menus.
item.name: SOWA Market - Eat, Greet & Shop!
